question:
Question: You are navigating to ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. Thinking back on past Action Generations and objects you’ve seen, what is the surrounding environment like at your current location?  
Choice:  
A. There is a large park with a playground in front of you, a building to your right, and a two-lane road below you.  
B. There is a large open square in front of me, residential buildings behind me, and a busy intersection below.  
C. There is a building directly in front of me, a busy highway behind me, and a bike path directly below.  
D. There are countless skyscrapers in all directions around me, a small park to my left, and a multi-lane highway below me.  
E. There are several low-rise buildings around me, wide roads, an intersection, many vehicles, street lights, and trees all around.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The environment shows several low-rise buildings around, wide roads with multiple lanes of traffic, an intersection, many vehicles on the road, street lights along the sidewalks, and trees planted along the streets. This matches the description in option E.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 31)]
Option: [E]
Reason: The video shows several low-rise buildings, wide roads with multiple lanes of traffic, an intersection (visible at the beginning), many vehicles on the road, street lights along the sidewalks, and trees planted along the streets. This matches the description in option E.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The environment shows several low-rise buildings around, wide roads with multiple lanes of traffic, an intersection, many vehicles on the road, street lights along the sidewalks, and trees planted along the streets. This matches the description in option E.
